item.description:
I have fond memories of good meals at Sel de la Terre.

Join us for country french cuisine with a little local flare.

FYI....French portions are generally smaller than American.

Sel de la Terre Dinner Menu

Directions & Parking

RULES of Engagement:

Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly so we can be seated together.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

All RSVP's are on a first come, first served basis.

You may only RSVP YES or NO. Maybe isn't an option.

Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend.

If you're not sure you can attend because you have other unconfirmed plans or uncertain transportation, please RSVP NO with a comment requesting to be placed on wait list.

If dinner is full and you wish to attend, please RSVP NO with a comment to be wait listed.

If there is an overwhelming response, the reservation may be increased or another seating arranged.

If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the event and you have not attended the event, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If I must change your RSVP to NO because you haven't replied to final update event confirmation email deadline, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within twenty-four hours of the event, without an explanation, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If you are a NO-SHOW for three events you are removed from the group.

NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant.

If it is less than twenty-fours from the meal and you're not able to attend or are running late, you must contact me directly by calling or texting 617 445-7549.

An email from you explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.

If you are removed and there were extenuating circumstances, please email me about rejoining.

Your feedback is appreciated so please, rate the event and venue by completing surveys afterward.

I will arrive at 5:15 PM to confirm our seating arrangements and most importantly welcome you.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Tonya/Meetup reservation or call/text my cell (617) 445 7549

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Sel de la Terre
